entities.description: The unweighted frequency of the total cases in the survey.
The total number of cases in the survey, specifically 11,207,634 cases.
The current population derived from valid cases out of the total cases.
The statistics related to the current population including mean, minimum, maximum, and standard deviation.
The UCR county code used in the survey.
The description of each UCR county code along with its unweighted frequency and percentage.

relationships.description: Relates the total survey cases to their unweighted frequency.
Represents the current population out of the total valid cases.
Describes the population statistics like mean, minimum, maximum, and standard deviation.
Categorizes the total cases by UCR county codes.
Provides descriptions for each UCR county code including unweighted frequency and percentage.
